com.cinema.controller

Class MovieInfoCardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cinema.controller.MovieInfoCardController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MovieInfoCardController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Created by Damrod on 02.06.2017. this class creates back of a card for MovieInfo. It shows movie info, description, category, trailer ect.
